name: Great Hatred
text: Your rage burns with vast intensity.
benefit: You gain an additional +1 bonus on melee and thrown weapon attacks against targets of your hatred racial trait.
staminaText: When you hit an opponent of a subtype subject to your hatred racial trait, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to deal an amount of extra damage equal to double the number of stamina points you spent.
benefit_zh: 在对抗你的仇恨种族特性中的种族时，你的近战与投掷攻击检定获得额外+1加值。
staminaText_zh: 当你击中一个拥有你的仇恨种族特性相关亚种的对手时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来造成两倍于耐力消耗的额外伤害。
